title: Barbie (Blu-Ray + Digital)
descriptions:
Title: Barbie (Blu-Ray + Digital)

Overview:
Step into the dazzling world of Barbie Land, where everything is perfect—unless you’re caught in an existential crisis or, well, being a Ken. This Blu-Ray + Digital edition delivers the hit film in stunning high definition, along with hours of bonus content that pulls back the curtain on the creativity, music, and style behind the phenomenon.

What’s Included:
- Blu-Ray disc of the feature film
- Digital copy for streaming and download (redeemable via included code)

Synopsis:
To live in Barbie Land is to be a perfect being in a perfect place—except for those rare moments when reality intrudes, or when you’re Ken just trying to find your place. Journey from the pastel perfection of Barbie Land to the real world and back again in a heartfelt, hilarious story about identity, empowerment, and embracing who you truly are.

Bonus Features:
- It’s a Weird World: Explore the film’s most imaginative sets and ideas.
- All-Star Barbie Party: A look at the ensemble cast and their on-screen chemistry.
- Musical Make-Believe: Behind the scenes of the film’s music and dance numbers.
- Becoming Barbie: The transformation, performance, and spirit behind Barbie.
- Welcome to Barbie Land: A tour of the vibrant, meticulously crafted world.
- Playing Dress-Up: An Extended Look at the Costumes of Barbie: Dive into the iconic fashion, from concept to couture.

Why You’ll Love It:
- A visually stunning, laugh-out-loud adventure with heart.
- Perfect for fans of bold production design, catchy music, and smart comedy.
- Collectible edition with deep-dive extras for film lovers and Barbie enthusiasts.

Technical Details:
- Format: Blu-Ray + Digital
- Genre: Comedy/Fantasy
- Bonus content subject to change without notice.

Bring home the vibrant charm, clever humor, and irresistible style of Barbie Land with this Blu-Ray + Digital edition—packed with exclusive features that make rewatching a total dream.
